# GET /v1/scmRepositories/{id}/relationships/pullRequests | Apple Developer Documentation

- [ App Store Connect API ](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi)

- [ GET /v1/scmRepositories/{id}/relationships/pullRequests ](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-scmrepositories-_id_-relationships-pullrequests)

-  GET /v1/scmRepositories/{id}/relationships/pullRequests 

Web Service Endpoint# GET /v1/scmRepositories/{id}/relationships/pullRequests

App Store Connect API 3.6+## [URL](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-scmrepositories-_id_-relationships-pullrequests#url)



```
GET https://api.appstoreconnect.apple.com/v1/scmRepositories/{id}/relationships/pullRequests
```

## [Path Parameters](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-scmrepositories-_id_-relationships-pullrequests#path-parameters)

`id``string` (Required) 

## [Query Parameters](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-scmrepositories-_id_-relationships-pullrequests#query-parameters)

`limit``integer`

 Maximum: `200`## [Response Codes](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-scmrepositories-_id_-relationships-pullrequests#response-codes)

` 200 OK``[ScmRepositoryPullRequestsLinkagesResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/scmrepositorypullrequestslinkagesresponse)`OK`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 400 Bad Request``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)`Bad Request`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 401 Unauthorized``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)`Unauthorized`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 403 Forbidden``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)`Forbidden`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 404 Not Found``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)`Not Found`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 429 ``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)``

 Content-Type: application/json ## [See Also](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-scmrepositories-_id_-relationships-pullrequests#see-also)

### [Getting Repository Information](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-scmrepositories-_id_-relationships-pullrequests#Getting-Repository-Information)

[`List All Git Repositories`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-scmrepositories)List all Git repositories Xcode Cloud can access.[`Read Git Repository Information`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-scmrepositories-_id_)Get information about a Git repository that Xcode Cloud can access.[`List All Git References for a Repository`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-scmrepositories-_id_-gitreferences)List all Git references for a specific repository that Xcode Cloud can access.[`GET /v1/scmRepositories/{id}/relationships/gitReferences`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-scmrepositories-_id_-relationships-gitreferences)[`List All Pull Requests for a Repository`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-scmrepositories-_id_-pullrequests)List all pull requests for a specific repository that Xcode Cloud can access.
